text:
retrofitting is a must—today's buildings will still be around in 2050!

the first step to a retrofit is the energy audit

let's make them faster and cheaper using open-access data.

thoughts? 👀 cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV https://t.co/Z6hHouDVrH
